What are the treatments for LAMA2-related muscular dystrophy ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of LAMA2-related muscular dystrophy:  - Boston Children's Hospital: Treatment and Care for Muscular Dystrophy  - Gene Review: Gene Review: LAMA2-Related Muscular Dystrophy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital muscular dystrophy due to partial LAMA2 deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Merosin def
